author: Anonymous Atom
title: Autograder
question:
0%  of   100%  x Stopped grading because part of starter file was changed or reordered.  Can't find (@htdf next-ball) in its proper sequence in the file.
However, I have not touched next-ball. I was at 98%, but once implementing an additional function, this new error is popping up. Any help would be awesome.
Thank you!!
instructor_answer:
For  everyone else's benefit...
OP brought this to office hours, and it turned out that a key part of the starter file had been commented out.  In OP's defense, it took me about 10 minutes to see it myself because looking at one screenful at a time it didn't look commented out.
We always get a number of these for problem set 4.
Things to keep in mind:
 - when the AG says it can't find something, it really isn't there
 - if it looks like it is there it is commented out
 - #; can have effect at a distance
